diffusion_modes

Functions for plotting diffusion modes of nanoparticle trajectories

plot_diffusion_modes_single_label(ecm, ...)

Plot the percentage of diffusion modes per age using a bar chart.

plot_diffusion_modes(df, label_column[, ...])

Plot the percentage of diffusion modes per age category.
